'''Lofty Tower's Fashionable Canvas''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Lofty Tower's Fashionable Canvas is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.
